name: Royal Goblin Hunt
description:
In the name of the King, all goblins must be slayed! As a Royal Archer, it is your duty to put an end to the goblin invasion!

Controls:

- WASD: Move

- Left Click: Charge Arrow/Shoot

-R Key: Switch between arrows

- Q: Use Potion

Game made for the #7dfps

Music made by Rolemusic ( FreeMusicArchive )
Zoria Tileset ( OpenGameArt )
